TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(object sender, ProcessInputEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProcessInputEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProcessInputEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProcessInputEventArgs)
public delegate void ProcessInputEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProcessInputEventArgs ^ e);
type ProcessInputEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProcessInputEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El se usa con el eventos.The is used with the event. Habilitan el acceso a los eventos de entrada de proceso del área de ensayo, que procesa los datos en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] eventos.Process input events enable access to the staging area, which processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events. Se procesa la entrada en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en las siguientes fases:Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. Fase de procesamiento previo.Pre-process stage. Administrador de entrada provoca la eventos.The input manager raises the event. 2. Fase de notificación previa.Pre-notify stage. Administrador de entrada provoca la eventos.The input manager raises the event. 3. El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] se generan eventos de entrada o eventos.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. Posterior a la fase de notificación.Post-notify stage. Administrador de entrada provoca la eventos.The input manager raises the event. 5. Fase de procesamiento posterior.Post-process stage. Administrador de entrada provoca la eventos.The input manager raises the event.
